title: Reading Comprehension A1: Sarah's Daily Routine

questions.question: Read the following text about Sarah's daily routine and answer the questions:
readingText: My name is Sarah and I am 25 years old. I live in a small apartment in London with my cat, Whiskers.
Every morning, I wake up at 7:00 AM. I brush my teeth and take a shower. Then I eat breakfast. I usually have toast and coffee.
At 8:30 AM, I go to work by bus. I work in an office. I like my job because my colleagues are very friendly.
I have lunch at 12:30 PM. After work, I go home at 5:00 PM. In the evening, I watch TV or read a book. I go to bed at 10:00 PM.

questions.questionText: What does Sarah have for breakfast?
What time does Sarah wake up?
Sarah goes to work by car.
questions.explanation: Sarah goes to work by bus, not by car.

questions.questionText: What is the name of Sarah's cat?

questions.hint: Read the text carefully. All the answers are directly stated in the passage.
